content: youtube tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=_yjo4gi_vsa *the mesh stitch is a very easy stitch to do with fantastic results i like that both sides of the blanket look the same there is no right side or wrong side except for the shell border but that doesn t matter at all * materials * 4 skeins of isaac mizrahi brand yarn from michael s stores in the u s it is a 3 weight yarn two skeins of princess two in castle * h size hook but it depends on gauge
